name: Los Arcos Scuba Diving
description: Los Arcos is the national marine park that is protected by the government. Los Arcos Scuba Diving is one of the most popular dive sites in Puerto Vallarta that is perfect for beginners and advanced divers. Los Arcos is a sandy slope that ranges from 70 feet to 110 feet and has a deep sea canyon that drops 1600 feet. Los Arcos has numerous dive sites to choose from and is filled with a large variety of tropical fish and marine life.
